code: import{applyMiddleware,combineReducers,createStore}from"redux";import{reducer as formReducer}from'redux-form';import thunkMiddleware from"redux-thunk";import appReducer from"./state/app-reducer";var reducers=combineReducers({appReducer:appReducer,form:formReducer});var store=createStore(reducers,applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleware));window.store=store;export default store;
